full_summary:
---

### Request for Proposal (RFP) for Smart Building Program – Regional Standing Offer, Quebec Region

**Project Number:** #MP2016-79156

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Issued by:**

* Defence Construction Canada (DCC)
* Address: 350 Albert St, 19th Floor, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K3, Canada
* Contact Information: Amanda Eid, amanda.eid@dcc-cdc.gc.ca, 343-540-6713

**Proposal Submission:**

* Submit your proposal electronically through the MERX Electronic Bidding System.
* Documents are available for download at http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply (see pricing information at https://www.merx.com/public/pricing).

**Objective:**

The objective of this RFP is to select a contractor who will enter into a Regional Standing Offer (SO) with DCC to provide services on an “as and when required” basis. The estimated maximum value of the contract is $1,400,000, with a term of two (2) years from the date of establishment.

**Services to be Provided:**

* As and when required services for the Department of National Defence (DND) locations in the Quebec Region.
* The selected contractor will be required to provide a range of services, including installation, deployment, reporting, and decommissioning services.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

Proposals will be evaluated based on the requirements outlined in the RFP documents.

**Notice:**

This is an open tender opportunity, and interested contractors are invited to submit their proposals through the MERX system.

**Contract Details:**

* Estimated maximum value: $1,400,000
* Term: two (2) years from the date of establishment
* Services to be provided: as and when required services for DND locations in the Quebec Region.
* Security requirements are identified in the RFP documents.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Closing Date and Time:**

The closing date and time for proposal submission is April 17, 2023 at 14:00:00 (EDT).
